headline: Trump Administration Moves to Accelerate AI Power Hookups
summary: US Energy Secretary Chris Wright urged the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission on Thursday to grant expedited reviews for data-center grid connections, according to documents reviewed by Bloomberg News.  Under a draft proposed rule Wright sent to the agency, those reviews would be limited to 60 days, a seismic shift for a process that currently can drag on for years.

headline: Can VST Stock's Disciplined Capital Allocation Power Long-Term Growth?
summary: Vistra's disciplined capital strategy, strong ROE and consistent shareholder returns highlight its potential for sustained long-term growth.

headline: What to Expect From Vistra's Next Quarterly Earnings Report
summary: Vistra is gearing up to release its third-quarter results next month, and analysts are expecting a double-digit decline in the company’s bottom-line figure.

headline: Vistra (VST) Expands Power Fleet, Acquires Seven New Natural Gas Facilities
summary: Vistra Corp. (NYSE:VST) is one of the 10 Best American AI Stocks to Buy According to Analysts. On October 22, Vistra Corp. (NYSE:VST) reported that it has acquired 7 modern natural gas generation facilities from Lotus Infrastructure Partners, which have a total capacity of about 2,600 megawatts. This transaction was completed after Vistra Corp. (NYSE:VST) […]
